A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Absolutely horrible. The writing itself is deplorable\, I cannot believe the amount of idiocy that was put into this movie. (Minor Spoilers)
Gravity in space?
Finn was reduced to a throwaway character.
Rose was born a throwaway character.
Poe (who actually made the best leadership decisions was portrayed in a bad light)
Vice Admiral Amilyn Holdo who made the worst decisions and was a a bad leader was given an undeserved self sacrifice. (It should have gone to Leia or Admiral Ackbar)
Liea (Superman) was corrupted by this movie and its plot devies.
Luke (F*** You Disney & F*** Ryan Johnson) The redeemer of the biggest villain in all of Star Wars for no explanation other than that he felt darkness in him tried to kill his nephew (the son of his beloved twin sister) Really?
Kylo Ren is still an angsty teen in disguise. Seriously he is not intimidating at all.
Rey is still a boring Mary Sue. 
The Casino Planet was a stupid waste of time. (BTW\, why not save the orphan slaves too?)
Please Keep Ryan Johnson away from future franchises\, you can pay critics but you can't pay everyone else.
